title: Nora Fatehi Evacuates With Her Team As Los Angeles Wildfires Escalate: 'This is Insane' - News18
summary:
Nora Fatehi Evacuates With Her Team As Los Angeles Wildfires Escalate: 'This is Insane'

Date: January 09, 2025 | Source: News18

Actor and dancer Nora Fatehi has opened up about her harrowing experience amid the ongoing wildfires in Los Angeles. Taking to Instagram, Nora shared her situation, revealing that she and her team were ordered to evacuate due to the escalating crisis.

  • Nora stated on Instagram, “I am in LA and the wildfires are crazy. I have never seen anything like that. This is insane, we just got an evacuation order five minutes ago.”
  • She expressed her hope of catching her flight while evacuating, saying, “I really hope I can catch it.”
  • The wildfires, particularly affecting the Pacific Palisades, have already resulted in five fatalities, over 1,500 buildings destroyed, and the evacuation of more than 100,000 residents.
  • Other celebrities, including Priyanka Chopra, have expressed their support for those affected, highlighting the severity of the situation.
  • The fires have resulted in significant challenges for firefighters due to hurricane-force winds aiding the rapid spread of flames.
“This s**t is scary. I am going to keep you guys updated. I hope people are safe, I have never seen anything before like this.”

The ongoing crisis has received widespread attention, with efforts being made to mitigate the increasing threat posed by the wildfires.
newTitle: Nora Fatehi Evacuates With Her Team As Los Angeles Wildfires Escalate: 'This is Insane'

  • The global advance total is estimated to be around Rs 40 to Rs 45 crore.
“Given the present sale of tickets and the excitement among the cine-goers, Game Changer is looking to open in the range of Rs 90.00 crore to Rs 100.00 crore.”

The success of Game Changer will significantly depend on audience reception in the coming days, particularly during the festive period.

The Roshans Trailer: How Hrithik's Surname Went From Nagrath To Roshan - NDTV Movies
summary:
The Roshans Trailer: How Hrithik's Surname Went From Nagrath To Roshan

Date: Upcoming Release
Source: New Delhi

Netflix has unveiled the trailer for the documentary The Roshans a day before Hrithik Roshan's 51st birthday, exploring the legacy of the Roshan family.

  1. Hrithik Roshan proudly shares his grandfather's voice in the trailer.
  2. The documentary covers the family's journey from Nagrath to Roshan.
  3. It highlights both triumphs and tragedies, including an attack on Rakesh Roshan.
  4. Features cameos from notable figures in Bollywood, including Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra.
  5. The release date is set for January 17 on Netflix.
“That's my grandfather's voice. His full name was Roshan Lal Nagrath. It's a very interesting story how our surname went from Nagrath to Roshan.” - Hrithik Roshan

The documentary promises to be a profound journey through the legacy and love of the Roshan family, contributing significantly to Hindi cinema.
newTitle: The Roshans Trailer: How Hrithik's Surname Went From Nagrath To Roshan

title: SCOOP: Sunny Deol, Aamir Khan and Rajinikanth to take on Hrithik Roshan and NTR Jr. on Independence Day - Bollywood Hungama
Rekhachithram Review | Alternate History Trope Keeps This Generic Thriller Afloat - Lensmen Reviews
summary:
Rekhachithram Review | Alternate History Trope Keeps This Generic Thriller Afloat

Publication Date: January 9, 2025 | Source: Lensmen Reviews

Rekhachithram, directed by Jofin T Chacko, attempts to leverage the alternate history genre to uplift a standard crime thriller but ends up being a passable film with notable compromises.

  • The film centers around a Kerala Police CI, Vivek Gopinath, who investigates a suicide linked to a missing person case from 1985.
  • It draws on elements from the 1985 film Kathodu Kathoram, which serves as a substantial backdrop.
  • The narrative lacks originality, delivering predictable twists and unexciting investigation beats.
  • The alternate history elements shine more than the primary narrative, offering some emotional depth to the female character.
  • Character performances, including Asif Ali and Anaswara Rajan, are competent but limited by the writing.
  • The film is filled with references and tributes to 1980s cinema legends, though execution varies in subtlety.
"With the effective inclusion of one or more real-life elements at the correct points, Rekhachithram is a passable thriller with evident compromises."

The movie aspires to blend real historical events with fiction but ultimately results in a standard thriller that may only please those with a keen interest in alternate histories.
newTitle: Rekhachithram Review: A Generic Thriller Enhanced by Alternate History

title: ‘It’s her foolishness': Sonu Sood says he is not on talking terms with ‘not a bad person’ Kangana Ranaut - Hindustan Times
summary:
Sonu Sood Addresses Fallout with Kangana Ranaut

Date: Jan 09, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Sonu Sood has revealed that he is no longer in touch with Kangana Ranaut following their fallout over the film Manikarnika. Despite their past friendship, Sonu stated that they have not spoken since he left the project.

  • The feud between Sonu Sood and Kangana Ranaut dates back over five years.
  • Sonu walked out of Kangana's film Manikarnika in 2019, which led to a breakdown in their relationship.
  • Despite the fallout, Sonu maintains fond memories of their friendship and speaks highly of Kangana's family.
  • He described recent incidents where mutual friends attempted to reunite them but were unsuccessful.
“I feel that it’s her foolishness, she is not a bad person. But sometimes, when you write or say things, you don’t actually think it through.” - Sonu Sood

In conclusion, while Sonu acknowledges the challenges in their relationship, he seems to retain a degree of respect for Kangana, emphasizing that he prefers not to speak ill of her.
newTitle: Sonu Sood Addresses Fallout with Kangana Ranaut

title: Priyanka Chopra shows burning LA from her home, Nora Fatehi escapes wildfires: ‘Got an evacuation order 5 minutes ago!' - Hindustan Times

Date: Jan 09, 2025

Nora Fatehi shared her terrifying experience with Los Angeles wildfires, revealing she received an evacuation order just minutes before she had to leave. Priyanka Chopra also documented the crisis from her home.

  • Nora Fatehi recorded a video from her car showing the raging fires in LA.
  • She expressed her fear and discussed her plans to stay near the airport to catch her flight.
  • Priyanka Chopra posted videos of the wildfires burning near her home and expressed her concern for everyone's safety.
  • The wildfires have destroyed over 1,000 structures and forced over 130,000 residents to evacuate.
  • Notable figures from Hollywood have also been affected, with many forced to flee their homes.
“I'm in LA and the wildfires are crazy. I've never seen anything like this... So, I quickly packed all my stuff and I'm evacuating out of here...” - Nora Fatehi

The wildfires have resulted in significant destruction in Los Angeles, with potential long-term impacts on both residents and the entertainment industry.

title: Once bigger than Shah Rukh, Salman Khan, this star lost it all after 20 straight flops, was unable to pay medical bills - Hindustan Times
summary:
The Rise and Fall of Rahul Roy: From Stardom to Struggles

Date: Jan 09, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Once a promising star in Bollywood, Rahul Roy's career fell into decline after a series of failures at the box office, leading him to face significant personal and financial struggles.

  • Debuted in 1990 with the hit film Aashiqui.
  • Achieved stardom but suffered a downfall with 20 consecutive flops.
  • Participated in reality shows and faced financial hardships.

  • Received support from Salman Khan during his health crisis.
  • Made a comeback in 2023 in both acting and producing roles.
“I did not even have the money to foot my medical bills.” - Rahul Roy

Rahul Roy's journey reflects the unpredictable nature of fame in the entertainment industry, illustrating that even the brightest stars can face significant challenges.

  • The film has made Rs 2.15 crore on day 35, bringing its total domestic collection to Rs 1213 crore.

title: Payal Kapadia secures nomination at Directors Guild of America Awards after Golden Globes snub - Hindustan Times
summary:
Payal Kapadia Nominated for DGA Award Following Golden Globes Snub

Date: Jan 09, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Payal Kapadia has received a nomination for the Directors Guild of America (DGA) award in the first-time director category for her film debut, All We Imagine As Light, just days after not winning at the Golden Globes.

  • The DGA announced the nominations on January 9, 2025.
  • Kapadia's film explores themes of love, longing, and loneliness among three women in Mumbai.
  • Other nominees in the same category include Megan Park, RaMell Ross, Halfdan Ullmann Tondel, and Sean Wang.
  • All We Imagine As Light won the Grand Prix award at the 2024 Cannes Film Festival, marking it as the first Indian film to win this award.
  • Kapadia was recently named Best Director by The National Society of Film Critics (NSFC) in New York.
"We didn't win but..." - Payal Kapadia reflecting on her Golden Globes experience.

This nomination is a significant recognition of Kapadia's talent as a first-time feature film director in the competitive landscape of international cinema.
newTitle: Payal Kapadia Nominated for DGA Award Following Golden Globes Snub
